attributes.action: Stop the closure of care homes for the elderly in the UK in order to cut costs and address the current shortage of nursing home provision for the elderly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Staffordshire about 20 care homes for the elderly are due to be closed due to the need to cut costs.  Across the UK there is already a shortage of quality nursing home provision for the elderly resulting in many having unreasonably long stays in hospital whilst they wait for a place to live.  As the elderly population increases we need more care homes with nursing care for our elderly not homes being shut to save money.
